snippet: "Before Hoboken had power, we had Danny," says a customer of Danny Vignola, who was back in his delivery truck on Friday, a few days after Hurricane Sandy left the waterfront city flooded and dark.
abstract: "Before Hoboken had power, we had Danny," says a customer of Danny Vignola, who was back in his delivery truck on Friday, a few days after Hurricane Sandy left the waterfront city flooded and dark.

headline.main: A Sense of Comfort in Hoboken as the U.P.S. Man Makes His Rounds
headline.print_headline: Comfort in Weary Hoboken Comes in a U.P.S. Uniform
